remarks: Closure properties of the recursive sequence builder.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jul-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2014.)
statement:
seqcl.1 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) $.
seqcl.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( F ` x ) e. S ) $.
seqcl.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x .+ y ) e. S ) $.
seqcl $p |- ( ph -> ( seq M ( .+ , F ) ` N ) e. S ) $.
$d .+ x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d M x y $.
$d N x $.
$d S x y $.
$d ph x y $.
